website_summaries.verdict: Extra loft and superb craftsmanship place this crib wedge a cut above the rest.
pros: Increased 14-degree incline is ideal for babies with severe digestive or respiratory issues
Precision cut for a flush fit under standard crib mattresses
Soft cotton outer cover is removable for washing
High quality foam maintains its shape
cons: Some users noted an unpleasant odor upon unboxing

website_summaries.verdict: This product improves acid reflux, colic and digestive issues.
pros: The wedge's outer pillow cover is made of 100% cotton and the inner pillowcase is 100% spill-resistant nylon
It's made of quality foam for optimal support
This crib mattress wedge is firm enough to go under the mattress without flattening
cons: The mattress is great for side sleeping

customer_reviews.title: It’s a dream worker for my 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: I waited to write a review to see how things went. I must say, it’s better than expected. It’s a very minimal incline, but enough to make a big difference in sinus drainage for my 2 year old. He used to stay up all night due to coughs and colds. Since getting this and putting it under his mattress, even when he has drainage, it doesn’t keep him from sleeping. It is truly a wonder we went so long miserably before making the purchase. I highly recommend it for 2 and up. Younger than that, I can’t say.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Marie

customer_reviews.title: Good product and happy with the quality
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this because my daughter has reflux and she has to sleep at an angle. Couldn't decide which one to buy 12 inch or 16 inch incline. This one is the 16 inch and Is good to have for when she gets congested and I need her to sit up for drainage. However, she is a tummy sleeper and this is too much of an incline for her. I lay her down at the top of her crib and in the morning she has scooted all the way down to where the crib mattress is flat. Still good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Nice Item with a weird smell
customer_reviews.text: Just my honest review here. When we first opened this item it looked good but it came with such a bad weird small like rat poisoning and I was definitely not going to put this next to my baby so I proceeded to place a return right away but when I did packed it back (2days later) the smell was completely gone 100% the wedge felt safe and looked good so we kept it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Helps with reflux
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the wedge pillow to help my little one with reflux. He absolutely loves the pillow & it definitely helps after feedings. The pillow case is of a great quality & design. Only drawback is a very chemicalized smell that came with the pillow. While I washed it, it seems to be from the foam rather than the case. The pillow also folds in half which I disliked at first but became more practical over time since it allows prop for a higher incline. Overall, great value for the price & can be used for tummy time as well. FYI Pediatrician recommended use after two months to ensure LO’s head would not tilt forward & obstruct breathing.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda

customer_reviews.title: Good product overall but not as high incline
customer_reviews.text: We bought this wedge for my toddlers bed because she gets sick often and needs to keep her head elevated. I saw that this wedge was a high incline and decided to purchase it. I was not very pleased with how the income is. It’s not as high as I would like. It barely lifts the head of her bed. I’m considering buying two of these for her mattress. Otherwise it’s a good product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible smell and does not work
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure how this product got so many good reviews. This pillow gives out terrible smell that I didn’t feel safe to let my baby sleep on it. I thought it might be like all those memory form, so I gave it 2 days to off gas and I washed the covers. The smell was still there after couple of days... I decided to give it a try to see if it at least functions as described. And nope! The pillow is so soft and with a split in the middle, it hardly lift my baby’s head up, so it doesn’t help with his reflux at all. Don’t waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Qingling Ni

customer_reviews.title: Dislike
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t like that fact that it was foldable. The idea of it was nice. However, the foldable area gives the pillow a slouch in the middle so when my baby sleeps on it she kind of dips in the middle. Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: User1234

customer_reviews.title: Sound Sleep
customer_reviews.text: Just received the Sleepy Slope by Cher Bébé and it works great! My infant nephew seems to prefer his crib with the Sleepy Slope rather than without. Worth every penny and would recommend to anyone with a little one around or on the way!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Used it for our GERD baby
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice wedge. It worked and our daughter had less projectile vomiting with it. It is easy to clean and easy to use. It didn’t do much under the mattress but on top of it it worked just fine. To keep our kiddo balanced on it we created a nest so she didn’t shift at night to the bottom. We have been using it for 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby colds too
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter does not actually have reflux or bad colic. I bought this crib wedge because she attends daycare and in the winter was sick ALL THE TIME! At night she would get so congested and it was disturbing her sleep. She would wake up in the middle of the night all stuffed up and upset. In addition to a humidifier, I thought the elevation from this wedge might help keep her nasal passages open and draining. It has definitely helped. It did take a few days for the material to "fluff" up and we did air it out, but then was it fine to start using.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Shrider

customer_reviews.title: My new "go to"
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel of the cover - it's soft, easy to clean (which I hardly have to do since my daughter stopped barfing her milk up every night thanks to the perfect angle!) and mama and baby are very happy (win win). It helps her sleep without getting colicky like she normally does or throwing up with reflux. And...that means it helps ME sleep. I don't know why I didn't try this sooner. I know what I'm getting for baby shower gifts for now on! (hint...it's this lol)
customer_reviews.author: Malorie Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Suggesting to all my friends!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome wedge for my reflux baby. It was used to help transition him from the rock and play at night to his crib and it worked well. I rolled up towels and put them under the crib sheet to keep him in place with the wedge and it works great! I have suggest this wedge to all of my friends with reflux babies... really just all babies. It’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Good pillow, smells funny at first
customer_reviews.text: This was a good wedge pillow for my baby. However, I returned it as the smell was so strong and I didn't feel comfortable letting my baby sleep on it when it had some chemical odor. I let it air out and it did go away after a couple of days.. I guess many products have that initial odor from manufacturing or the materials used.
customer_reviews.author: Laney

customer_reviews.title: Sleepy Slope Success
customer_reviews.text: We love the Sleepy Slope! First thing you will notice out of the package is it is made of high quality material which was important for us when placing it in our baby's bed. We did not want to skimp on quality just to save a couple dollars. We have already noticed an improvement in sleep and reflux. Problem Solved. The foam pieces fit seamlessly together once zipped into the cover with the crib sheet pulled over it. This was a great investment we highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crib Wedge Will Be a Great Shower Gift
customer_reviews.text: This Crib Wedge looks super comfortable. I can't wait to see a little baby sleeping on it. I remember propping up the feet of the my baby's crib to relieve colic and during nasty colds. This looks like a much better way to help little ones sleep. I can't wait to take it to the shower next month!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great for newborns
customer_reviews.text: My newborn son suffers from acid reflux, and has been sleeping a lot better since using this wedge.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like a pro!
customer_reviews.text: Helped TREMENDOUSLY for our baby with his acid reflux. He was also used to sitting up when being fed and ultimately falling asleep so it worked great. Only thing I’ll say that might be viewed as negative would be that he would eventually wind up in the bottom of the crib because he would shimmy down due to the incline no matter the height
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: This wedge is absolutely perfect. I love the fact that the cover is washable. Made me a lot more comfortable purchasing it. The cover is also super soft which I love. The fact that it's foldable is also great because it makes it easier to pack in a bag for traveling overnight. We purchased both sizes and love them both. Would definitely purchase and recommend any of Cher Bebe's products!
customer_reviews.author: MamaCat81

customer_reviews.title: Gives comfort and good sleep for my baby
customer_reviews.text: I just love it.. I am using this for my 2 and half months old daughter because she is having gas and colic issues a lot but after using this it’s work like a miracle for my baby.. it’s not to high incline but enough high to give comfort for babies.. once my little one is comfortable she slips down from the wedge but I don’t feel like it’s safety hazard for my little baby because her movement make her to slip little by little.. so it’s just solve my problem and gives baby and me a good sleep throughout the night which is much needed..
customer_reviews.author: Jalindi

customer_reviews.title: Pointless
customer_reviews.text: Pointless and didn't do the job. Not good for a baby who is very active at night and moves alot. He ended up sliding and twisting more. It didnt do the job
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Must have for new moms
customer_reviews.text: Add to your registry immediately and if he or she is already born it isn’t too late don’t hesitate just order. Babies digestive systems are very fragile and they could spit up milk and choke
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria P.

customer_reviews.title: This was a great add to my baby's crib for when she has ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a great add to my baby's crib for when she has a cold. It helps prop her up without being too dramatic of a tilt. It also folds in half so I can travel with it.
customer_reviews.author: MLAFormat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Product!
customer_reviews.text: The wedge is an absolute saving grace! Our little one became ill with a cold that turned more severe when she was just a few weeks old. This helped her being able to breathe easy and get sleep. The doctor recommended elevating and we have since recommended to all of our friends with babies! She sleeps through the night now and we can't imagine her sleeping without one. Very high quality material and fast shipping. Highly recommend this seller!
customer_reviews.author: JD Rob

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in the crib and keeps a strong shape. Doesn’t move around either nor cause baby to slide down. My son loves it and sleeps on it every night.
customer_reviews.author: Emily B

customer_reviews.title: Works wonder
customer_reviews.text: My baby has reflux issue, so I bought this item. This works great for the baby having reflux issue. Highly recommend. Disclaimer: ask your pediatrician before using it
customer_reviews.author: Skozey

customer_reviews.title: Non conventional use for the wedge
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our daughter when she was a little less than a year old. We used it to transition her from a snugga giraffe to the crib. This Wedge helped to prop the crib mattress up to give her a similar incline to the snugga giraffe. It worked like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Where was this when I had my first!?
customer_reviews.text: I truly believe this crib wedge was a life changer when it came to my new baby. With severe reflux issues, just propping this underneath the crib has done wonders for her reflux, allowing her to get an ample amount of sleep (total baby and mom win). On top of the benefits like my family has seen, the material is top of the line, and super easy to clean. I feel confident in the sleep environment my babies in while using this crib wedge!
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Atamian

customer_reviews.title: Horrible smell
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money and time. This piece looks great but it smells horrible like a chemical. Cannot use this with a newborn because of the smell. I am returning today.
customer_reviews.author: Demetrius

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. My daughter has been colicky with acid reflux since 3 weeks old. She is now 5 months old and still dealing with these issues. We bought this wedge a few weeks ago to adjust her from bassinet to crib and wish we did this all along. She loves it and sleeps so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Louis DaSilva

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected under my sons crib Keeps his head elevated so that he breathes easier at night
customer_reviews.author: Keith OConnor

customer_reviews.title: Has a smell
customer_reviews.text: The pillow seemed ok but had a smell :( had to return
customer_reviews.author: Vee1111

customer_reviews.title: Works for toddler reflux
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but i feel the angle could be slightly higher. Helps my child with reflux in the night.
customer_reviews.author: Gowest123

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile and great fit for crib!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only wedge we could find that actually fits the length of the crib, so fearing our baby would wiggle off of it was not a concern. Additionally, we could take out one of the pillows, or fold them over to make a double wedge and put it under the mattress for when our baby was congested. It really is great.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This pillow looks intimidating at first, but when used under the mattress the lift isn't as dramatic as I thought it would be. I think this helped my babie's reflux, but it's hard to know when you're using so many things to help. I would only use until they can move/roll and with a video baby monitor - just for safety's sake.
customer_reviews.author: brwneyes525

customer_reviews.title: Does what it’s supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality, perfectly crib sized wedge. I put ours under the mattress and it offered the perfect incline to help keep our little one’s reflux at bay.
customer_reviews.author: jesskathrin

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Baby w/ reflux sleeps great.
customer_reviews.text: Our baby has reflux and it was important that he learn to sleep in his crib instead of an elevated napper. This wedge did the trick. He sleeps so well on it and does not spit up when he’s elevated. Very comfortable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Mac McKnight

customer_reviews.title: Baby seems to like it!
customer_reviews.text: We were unsure if our baby’s cries were from reflux but we were willing to try anything. His crying has definitely diminished since getting the crib wedge and I also think it helps with preventing him to choke on his own spit up if he happens to do that while sleeping. Product is durable but soft enough for baby. Would definitely recommend to other parents!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie hill

customer_reviews.title: My baby's reflux problem gone!
customer_reviews.text: My baby would spit out milk as soon as we would lay him flat in the crib. It didn't matter how long we hold him upright or if we burp him before putting him down. This wedge is a godsent! Our son's reflux problem was gone the very first night we used the wedge. He no longer spits out milk when in bed. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha B.

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfactory
customer_reviews.text: This was not as shown its two pieces and poor baby falls in between the two pieces they have shoved into a pillow case...overall 1 out of 5 would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amber Signer

customer_reviews.title: Helps to transition to a crib
customer_reviews.text: Super useful to help baby transition to a crib from sleeping inclined in a rock&play sleeper or a swing.
customer_reviews.author: Nadxelle Velasco

customer_reviews.title: I do like the product and happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I do like the product and happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: ali

customer_reviews.title: Helps reduce acid reflux pain
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to prevent my infant from laying flat to reduce his discomfort from acid reflux. This was a life saver. He is still flat enough for comfort but has him at a slight angle. It is also good for children who get ear infections and cant sleep flat
customer_reviews.author: joniqua goode

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Made to Quiet Reflux!
customer_reviews.text: There are many uses for this Crib Wedge, but what I found it most helpful for was reducing reflux with my 3 month old baby, by placing the wedge underneath of the crib mattress. This elevated the are where his head went, just enough, so that it would help settle his stomach after eating. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Lathrop

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly underneath the crib and has a great angle
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly underneath the crib and has a great angle
customer_reviews.author: April Mangowitz

customer_reviews.title: Not just for babies
customer_reviews.text: I actually use this under my mattress to help me sleep. I have a terrible time laying flat due to my chest/lung issues. This wedge is the perfect size for me! You have brought me wonderful, restful sleep!
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: I have a mini crib so I cut it to fit 🤷🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this wedge. My baby has severe reflux and it’s been great for him. The only thing is that he tends to roll down it. (Hence the 4 Stars). Brilliant for reflux but when your baby starts to wiggle it can be a challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: it truly helps with reflux symptoms at night and during nap time
customer_reviews.text: my 7 month old twin daughters suffered from reflux for most of their little lives. At about 4 months old the twins started to sleep comfortably in their cribs with the use of the Cher Bebe' crib wedge. The material is soft, stain resistant, and durable. Thanks again for the great product! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: theresa mcclenathan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but doesn’t work for intense reflux
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality product. It just didn’t work for my babies reflux, that is really intense.
customer_reviews.author: T Branco

customer_reviews.title: Perfect night sleep
customer_reviews.text: More than expected. Perfect fit for my one month old grandson. He’s been sleeping peacefully with no issues since he has been sleeping with his wedge.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Shymoniak

customer_reviews.title: Smells but good??
customer_reviews.text: Stinks at first but exactly what we needed for our babies reflux.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Garner

customer_reviews.title: Worth getting
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves sleeping on this thing as a toddlers and when she was an infant. Definitely worth trying out, I mean we as parents by dumb thing we dont use like wipe warmers that never work all the time, definitely should give this pillow wedge a look into.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes a huge difference in little one’s breathing while sleeping
customer_reviews.text: This product has made a huge difference in our little one’s breathing when sleeping. We bought one for home and one for day care and worth every penny! Would absolutely recommend to anyone trying to help their child breathe and sleep better.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J McEligot

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product!!
customer_reviews.text: My baby has done so great with this product! I would buy it again if I needed to!!
customer_reviews.author: Mell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for under the mattress
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for under the mattress. Raises the head up just enough to allow the baby to sleep comfortable. Great quality too.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia H.

customer_reviews.title: Helps baby stay asleep!
customer_reviews.text: Cushy, soft material, stays in place, great for babies that spit up or have colic. Helps baby stay asleep!
customer_reviews.author: Kentley Dean

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing and I highly recommend! I recently got this for my almost 2 year old to help her sleep while she had a cold. Worked amazing and decided to keep it in her crib!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not too happy
customer_reviews.text: My son just really can’t adjust to how stiff they is. I understand that it’s for their safety but the foam really feels more like cardboard. A little disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: We just ordered another one for pack and play...it definitely helps!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have crib wedge!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to order this product after using Cher Bebes bassinet wedge pillow! The memory foam makes it so comfortable and has helped my baby to sleep better being propped up at an incline! It is well made and easy to wash, highly recommend trying this product!
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: So glad we purchased
customer_reviews.text: We have loved this crib wedge for our baby with reflux. The customer service is also great. They sent a personal thank you letter in the mail for purchasing their product. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This was great for my little one's reflux! I slid it under my crib mattress and it worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay L England

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for babies with moderate to severe reflux. The material is soft and comfortable for baby. I got it when my baby was a new born and I felt at ease knowing she was sleeping comfortable and safe.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Kilby

customer_reviews.title: great product worth every penny 👍
customer_reviews.text: love it my little one was having some sinus trouble and this made is so he could sleep and he loves it i think because he feels like he is being held
customer_reviews.author: tara

customer_reviews.title: Solid crib wedge
customer_reviews.text: Very nice crib wedge! Our 14-week-old baby tends to spit up if he's had milk right before being put down. This helps a lot with that and he is comfortable on it--the angle is fine. Solid product, worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Really seamless fit in a standard crib. Very helpful for my daughter. Only issue is it makes her roll over more but i think it would happen with any of these.
customer_reviews.author: BZweig

customer_reviews.title: Baby kept sliding down
customer_reviews.text: There's a strong odor in the pillow when I first opened the box. We used it with my baby for her Reflux. I think it helps overall, but baby kept sliding down (might) be due to the slope of the pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So helpful and a wonderful company!!!!
customer_reviews.text: They are a wonderful company and truly were concerned about my child's acid reflux and these wedges help sooooo much. Thank you so much!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Shute

customer_reviews.title: This is a great way to safely elevate your baby's torso during sleep
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to safely elevate your baby's torso during sleep. So happy that we discovered this product! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Maite Bursic

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: And just the right amount of elevation for my baby!
customer_reviews.author: Abby Harrison

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: we've been using this wedge in the baby's crib for the past 3 months. it seems to relieve her reflux and teething discomfort- she sleeps at least 7 hours without waking
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great although he slides down in the middle of the night so i placed it under the mattress. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Good product. The elevation helped when he was sick. Little babies might slide down and end up sideways but our baby is a big guy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: My son was premature and needed a wedge for his acid reflux. This wedge was the perfect height.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Wedge idea is a good concept but my baby just rolled down it or would shift to one side and be crooked. Not a fan.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect height for severe infant reflux
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for granddaughter with severe reflux. Works great. Just the perfect height to keep her upright while sleeping to cut down on reflux episodes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my baby when he had acid reflux. Now we only use it when he is sick. Fits in the crib perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My baby has acid reflux and this is perfect for reclining him!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great but it a little stiffer than I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product for a little one with colic and reflux
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product for a little one with colic and reflux! quality material, soft and comfortable for the little one and durable- no signs of wear after a couple months of use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect height!
customer_reviews.text: Just the right height, works great for those times when he has a cold or an ear infection and you needa slight incline to help draining.

customer_reviews.title: Works great under the mattress
customer_reviews.text: We placed this wedge under our baby’s crib mattress and it is really helping with his reflux. The wedge supports the mattress well.

customer_reviews.text: Quality and thickness. Expected better quality but looks like it's been used and compressed

customer_reviews.title: Good quality , still waiting for it to work to lessen the reflux.
customer_reviews.text: Hasn’t worked well for reflux yet, but the quality and comfort of the wedge is good.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my baby!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my baby! I Think it will help him for better sleep!

customer_reviews.text: Works great for my little one with reflux issues. It's just enough incline.

customer_reviews.text: Great for side sleeping, but wedge is too short for belly sleepers, like my child.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality crib wedge
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality bed wedge perfect for any infant suffering from acid reflux. It is safe and affordable. We purchased two (one for our home and one for daycare)
customer_reviews.author: Katie Damo

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My son has reflux so he needs to be upright.

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Best pillow !
customer_reviews.text: I am a new mommy ! And this pillow saved my life !! The only thing my lil 3 month old sleeps on .

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Incline
customer_reviews.text: Used in our baby’s crib - it was great and helped her sleep.

customer_reviews.title: This foam wedge is just what was needed. I ...
customer_reviews.text: This foam wedge is just what was needed. I purchased this for our granddaughter and it has worked wonders!

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, but unfortunately it was too long to fit into the crib used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I'd definitely recommended it for anyone looking to provide colic relief for their infant. I liked how the sleepy slope came packaged, and the two pieces were easy to zip together and set up.
customer_reviews.author: Blah

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for reflux and colds
customer_reviews.text: Helpful for reflux and also when they've got a cold.
customer_reviews.author: Jared A

customer_reviews.title: ... the other options in here but not necessary the best one, at least not for us
customer_reviews.text: this is somewhat more expensive than the other options in here but not necessary the best one, at least not for us. I did not see any difference with my babys reflux problem and baby always slide down to the bottom where the crib is flat. Last week we tried one that we borrowed from a friend and it worked better as my baby will stay in the same position for the whole night.
customer_reviews.author: calidoscopio

customer_reviews.title: She is sleeping better and I know she is safer from choking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my new Granddaughter. She is sleeping better and I know she is safer from choking. The size fits the bassinet when it is folded and unfolds to move to the crib with ease. I do not have to worry about her falling off the edge and getting caught between the edge of the bed and the wedge. The cover comes off for easy cleaning in the wash. I recommend this wedge for all new parents.
customer_reviews.author: PokeyBubbie

customer_reviews.title: Didn't use it yet.
customer_reviews.text: I don't think we have used it yet. Granddaughter has hip displasia and I think we just used a pillow for sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

feature_bullets: 100% Cotton (Outer Pillow Cover) /100% Spill-resistant Nylon (Inner Pillowcase)
IMPROVES ACID REFLUX, COLIC, and DIGESTION |14˚ angled baby sleeping wedge effectively elevates baby's head and chest, reducing vomiting and congestion while aiding in digestion and gas relief
SUPPORTS HEAD and TORSO | Sleepy Slope will never go flat under your baby, made of quality foam for optimal support. Our crib mattress wedge is firm enough to go under the mattress without flattening

UNLIKE BABY or INFANT SLEEP POSITIONERS with SIDE BOLSTERS | Our wedge pillow for reflux has no fixed parts that can create breathing problems. Additionally, this wedge can fix your problems from underneath the crib mattress
DUAL COVERS are EASY to WASH | Saves you time! Zippered cotton cover is machine washable on gentle cycle. Big messes are no problem - Just wipe nylon inner cover clean

APPROVED SAFE and HEALTHY | All materials used for this baby wedge have been approved by the USA Consumer Product Safety Commission. Trust that your babies and toddlers are using a tested, hypoallergenic product that is free of anything dangerous
